<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">|&#42; the LLJIT class from the llvm-c/LLJIT.h header. It requires to following   &#42;|</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">|&#42; Many exotic languages can interoperate with C code but have a harder time  &#42;|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">|&#42; with C++ due to name mangling. So in addition to C, this interface enables &#42;|</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">|&#42; tools written in such languages.                                           &#42;|</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">|&#42;       changed without warning. Only C API usage documentation is           &#42;|</span></CodeLine>
